ModMetaData.name: Insect Lair Incident
ModMetaData.author: Gilith
ModMetaData.description:
Transforms the Odyssey InsectLair into a random incident that spawns on your colony map, similar to the Anomaly PitGate.
[b]Progressive Emergence[/b] The ground cracks and shifts over 8-16 hours before the cave entrance fully opens. Move your structures and colonists to safety!
[b]Recurring Insectoid Waves[/b] Insectoids emerge from the depths every day, with wave strength scaling to your colony's wealth. The attacks continue until you seal the entrance.
[b]Vanilla Cave System[/b] Explore the full Odyssey InsectLair cave with all vanilla rewards: Gravcore, GravlitePanel, ancient crates, and InsectJelly.
[b]Boss Fight[/b] A massive boss guards the depths. Defeat it to unlock the ability to collapse the entrance and stop the waves permanently.
[b]VFE Insectoids Integration[/b] If VFE Insectoids is installed, each incident chooses a random geneline (Sorne, Nuchadus, Chelis, Kemia, or Xanides). The cave will be filled with insects from that geneline, and the boss will be the geneline's unique leader! Natural vanilla InsectLairs also support VFE genelines (configurable).
[b]Fully Configurable[/b] Access the mod settings menu to customize: - Threat points multiplier (25% to 300%) - Wave spawn interval (0.5 to 5 days) - Auto-collapse delay after boss death (1 to 10 days) - VFE integration for vanilla lairs (ON/OFF) - Quick presets: Easy, Normal, Hard, Extreme
[b]Default Balance[/b] - Appears after day 60 - 45 days minimum between incidents - Wave strength: 40% of colony threat points - Auto-collapse 3 days after boss death - Cannot spawn in unexplored (fogged) areas
Requires: Odyssey DLC Optional: VFE Insectoids (for geneline variety)
